item.title: Technologies Facebook is using
item.description: From Facebook https://opensource.facebook.com/ Hydra https://github.com/facebookresearch/hydra 1 2 3 4 5 6 Hydra [framework] Elegantly configure complex applications. https://hydra.cc 3rd Party LGTM 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 LGTM https://lgtm.com/ Provides "Continuous security analysis". A code analysis platform for finding zero-days and preventing critical vulnerabilities CodeQL by GitHub and Semmle // Bodacious Blog
